text: Madalyn Murray O'Hair (April 13, 1919 – September 29, 1995) was an American atheist activist. She was the founder of the American Atheists and its president from 1963 to 1986. She created the first issues of American Atheist Magazine. Many people criticized her and called her "the most hated woman in America". In 1995 she was kidnapped, murdered and dismembered along with her son Jon Murray and granddaughter Robin Murray O'Hair, by the former American Atheist office manager David Roland Waters. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography of O'Hair at About.com * Biography of O'Hair at Rotten.com * 1968 debate between Baptist minister Walter Martin and O'Hair – MP3 file * * Madalyn Murray O'Hair at NNDB * Madalyn Murray O'Hair vs. Religious Broadcasting at urbanlegends.about.com * Meeting Satan Herself: An evening with Madalyn Murray O'Hair: 14 September 1977 * The Murder of Madalyn Murray O'Hair: America's Most Hated Woman Crime Magazine Category:1919 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Deaths from asphyxiation Category:American murder victims Category:American activists Category:American atheists Category:People from Pittsburgh
